prerequisites.supportedUseCase: Shows key metrics and status associated with user endpoints/devices and endpoint security agents.

queries.name: query0
queries.query:
Find HostAgent with active=true as agent
  that (monitors|manages|protects) (Host|Device)
return
  agent.active as name,
  count(agent) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find HostAgent with lastReportedTime < date.now - 7days as d
  that (monitors|manages|protects) (Host|Device)
Return 
  d.displayName as device, 
  d.lastReportedTime as lastSeenOn, 
  d.email as owner

widgets.title: User Devices by OS and Version

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find (user_endpoint|workstation|laptop|desktop|computer|smartphone|tablet) as d
return

  d.osVersion as osVersion,
  count(d) as deviceCount

widgets.title: Number of users with Google Chrome installed, by version

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND User
THAT HAS Device
THAT (INSTALLED|ASSIGNED) Application
  WITH displayName ~= ('Chrome' or 'Chromium') as a
RETURN COUNT(User) as value, a.version as name

widgets.title: Devices with Google Chrome installed, by version

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND User as user
THAT HAS Device as device
THAT (INSTALLED|ASSIGNED) Application
  WITH displayName ~= ('Chrome' or 'Chromium') as a
RETURN 
  user.displayName,
  user.email,
  device.serialNumber,
  a.version as chromeVersion
